import React,{useState}from"react";import{TextField,Button,Container,Box,Typography}from"@mui/material";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({username:"",email:"",password:""});const navigate=useNavigate();const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post("http://0.0.0.0:5000/api/auth/register",formData);alert("Registration successful");navigate("/login");// Redirect to login after successful registration
